name: Powershell Exec, Windows Command Shell, Hidden Bind TCP Inline
author: Spencer McIntyre
vlad902 <vlad902@gmail.com>
sd
Borja Merino <bmerinofe@gmail.com>
description:
Execute an x86 payload from a command via PowerShell. Listen for a connection from certain IP and spawn a command shell.
                          The shellcode will reply with a RST packet if the connections is not
                          coming from the IP defined in AHOST. This way the port will appear
                          as "closed" helping us to hide the shellcode.
